alert.note: Alert for Greeley; Howard; Sherman; Valley (Nebraska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Hastings (North Central Kansas and South Central Nebraska)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 09 at 4:27PM CDT by NWS Hastings
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of southwestern Greeley, Valley, northern Sherman and northwestern Howard Counties through 500 PM CDT... At 427 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Arcadia to near Cotesfield. Movement was south at 10 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Strong thunderstorms will be near... Cotesfield around 445 PM CDT. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with these storms and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
